comments.text: I believe they're all treated as "typed" right now.
comments.raw_text: I believe they're all treated as "typed" right now.
comments.author: jruderman@gmail.com
comments.creator: jruderman@gmail.com

comments.text: yes, they are all considered typed. On the other side, adding complication may also be a loss from a certain point of view (may have schema and perf implications). So the best compromise really depends on the use-case and what we are trying to achieve.
